mapper.select: SELECT c.coupon_id AS couponId, c.coupon_name AS name, c.coupon_valid AS validDate FROM coupon c ORDER BY c.coupon_created_at DESC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT e.event_id AS id, e.event_name AS name, e.event_per_price AS perPrice, p.performance_img AS img FROM event e JOIN seat s ON e.seat_id = s.seat_id JOIN performance p ON s.performance_id = p.performance_id JOIN status st ON e.status_id = st.status_id WHERE st.status_code IN (100, 101) ORDER BY e.event_created_at DESC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM coupon c WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM event e JOIN status s ON e.status_id = s.status_id WHERE e.coupon_id = c.coupon_id AND s.status_code IN (100, 101) )
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM event e JOIN status s ON e.status_id = s.status_id WHERE e.event_type = 1 AND s.status_code IN (100, 101)

SELECT e.event_id AS eventId, p.performance_title AS performanceTitle, p.performance_place AS performancePlace, p.performance_date AS performanceDate, p.performance_time AS performanceRuntime, s.seat_code AS seatCode, sc.seat_class_grade AS seatClassGrade, e.event_per_price AS perPrice, p.performance_img AS performanceImg, st.status_name AS eventStatusName FROM event e JOIN seat s ON e.seat_id = s.seat_id JOIN seat_class sc ON s.seat_class_id = sc.seat_class_id JOIN performance p ON s.performance_id = p.performance_id JOIN status st ON e.status_id = st.status_id WHERE e.event_id = #{eventId}

SELECT e.event_id AS eventId, e.event_name AS name, e.event_created_at AS createdAt FROM event e JOIN status s ON e.status_id = s.status_id WHERE e.event_type = 1 AND s.status_code IN (100, 101) AND e.event_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') ORDER BY e.event_created_at DESC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM event e JOIN status s ON e.status_id = s.status_id WHERE e.event_type = 1 AND s.status_code IN (100, 101) AND e.event_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
SELECT e.event_id AS eventId, e.event_name AS name, e.event_created_at AS createdAt FROM event e JOIN status s ON e.status_id = s.status_id WHERE s.status_code = 101 ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 5
